scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/index.html && usemin aboutus.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/aboutus.html && usemin browseprojects.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/browseprojects.html && usemin dashboard.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/dashboard.html && usemin freelancers.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/freelancers.html && usemin messages.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/messages.html && usemin postproject.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/postproject.html && usemin profile.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/profile.html && usemin projects.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/projects.html && usemin pricing.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/pricing.html && usemin signin.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/signin.html && usemin signup.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/signup.html && usemin howitworks.html -d build --htmlmin -o build/howitworks.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
